      • preProcess

        public java.util.List<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> preProcess(int C_input,
                                                         int I_input,
                                                         int A_input,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
        The method to compute an exact set and a better set based on the input CVSS valuations.
        Parameters:
        C_input - is the input valuation for Confidentiality Impact.
        I_input - is the input valuation for Integrity Impact.
        A_input - is the input valuation for Availability Impact.
        nodes - is the ArrayList that contains information about the structure of the attack graph.
        Returns:
        prefPairs is a List> that contains the set of exacts and better based on the input.

      • analyze

        public void analyze(int C_input,
           int I_input,
           int A_input,
           java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes)
        A method to analyze the CVSS impacts.
        Parameters:
        C_input - is the input valuation for Confidentiality Impact to be measured.
        I_input - is the input valuation for Integrity Impact to be measured.
        A_input - is the input valuation for Availability Impact to be measured.
        nodes - is the ArrayList that contains information about the structure of the attack graph.
